document.full_text: libya's top oil official shokri ghanem appeared in rome on wednesday, saying he had defected because of relentless bloodshed under muammar gaddafi's rule.
document.title: libya's oil chief ghanem defects, in rome now
lines_and_colors: libya's top oil official shokri ghanem appeared in rome on wednesday, saying he had defected because of relentless bloodshed under muammar gaddafi's rule.
